title: Autofill
body: I have a hard enough time getting an over 50% win rate without every second game being auto filled to a role i cant carry in. Fuck you riot and fuck autofll.

replies.body: I'd rather wait a couple more minutes, if it means I get to play my primary role. Also, auto fill shouldn't be a thing in ranked!

Just last year there was no role select before champion select. It came down to pick order and how fast you could type, and that just wasn't fair. I would much rather a system that gets us a preferred role most of the time. We've always had to be able to play the least popular role (usually support), that hasn't changed.
